opinionTexts.li: "It was a little embarrassing, but seeing {OBSERVER_nameShort} look at me like that... it was kind of thrilling."

"I felt a blush, but {OBSERVER_nameShort}'s gaze was warm and accepting. I appreciate {OBSERVER_possessive} understanding."
"Knowing {OBSERVER_nameShort} saw me naked makes me feel even more connected to {OBSERVER_objective}."
"There's an intimacy in being seen by {OBSERVER_nameShort} without pretense. I cherish it."
"I hope {OBSERVER_nameShort} enjoyed the view. I certainly enjoyed {OBSERVER_possessive} reaction."
"It was a surprise, but {OBSERVER_nameShort} just smiled. I love {OBSERVER_possessive} open-mindedness."
"Feeling completely exposed, yet completely safe with {OBSERVER_nameShort}. That's true trust."
"I felt a little shy, but {OBSERVER_nameShort}'s eyes held only admiration. It was a good feeling."

"I felt completely myself, and {OBSERVER_nameShort} saw me for who I am. It's a good thing."
"Knowing {OBSERVER_nameShort} was there made me feel a little bold, a little free."

"Didn't really think about it much when {OBSERVER_nameShort} saw me. It's just skin."
"Caught {OBSERVER_nameShort}'s eye while I was exposed. Neither of us seemed particularly bothered."
"It was a brief moment. {OBSERVER_nameShort} saw me, and then {OBSERVER_pronoun} moved on."
"I guess {OBSERVER_nameShort} saw me. I wasn't trying to hide anything."

"I suppose {OBSERVER_nameShort} has seen it all before. Nothing new here."
"It was a simple observation from {OBSERVER_nameShort}. No big deal."

"I was just doing my thing, and {OBSERVER_nameShort} happened to be there."
"No particular reaction from {OBSERVER_nameShort}, and none from me either."
"It's just {OBSERVER_nameShort}. I'm not going to make a fuss about it."

"Just another day on the Rimworld, with {OBSERVER_nameShort} seeing me as I am."

"I'm sure {OBSERVER_nameShort} has seen worse. Or better, who knows."
